data.meta_site_name: Strictly Business Magazine | Lincoln - Strictly Business Magazine is Lincoln Nebraska's source for local business news, profiles on local businesses, people & information on Lincoln, NE. Since 1996
data.text:
Caring Friends In Home Care (caringfriendsinhomecare.com) is elated to welcome Laura Hunt to their human resources team. Laura joined Caring Friends in November of this year. She enjoys being in a positive environment surrounded by people that support each other. Previously, Laura has worked in the home health care and medical fields for the last 40 years.

Laura was born and raised in Lincoln. She has two children, Makensie and Taylor. Taylor is married to Autumn, and together they have one child. Laura has a passion for riding long distance on her motorcycle. She takes several trips every year. She also loves to camp, and sometimes tries her hand at fishing, although she claims she is not very good at it.
